description:
A former teacher, now a homeless vagrant, wandering from school to school after they have closed down during the war.
He attempts to rape http://anidb.net/ch6961 [Kana], gets away with 12 million yen from http://anidb.net/ch6962 [Naoyuki]`s duffel bag (after Kana stabbed him with her knife), and makes an anonymous report about the kids to the police (before collapsing in the telephone booth).
His name is Yoshino (吉野, never mentioned in the anime where he`s referred to as 浮浪者 = "the vagrant"); in the novel his role is much larger than in the anime.
name: Furousha
